Package Ex1

Class Polynom

java.lang.Object
Ex1.Polynom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Ex1.cont_function, Ex1.function, Ex1.Polynom_able, java.io.Serializable
public class Polynom
extends java.lang.Object
implements Ex1.Polynom_able
This class represents a general Polynom: f(x) = a_1X^b_1 + a_2*X^b_2 +...+ a_n*Xb_n, where: a_1, a_2 ... a_n are real numbers and b_1, b_2 ... b_n are integer (summed a none negative). all the elements in the polynom are standard monoms as we described in the monom class. We defined Polynom so that there can be spaces everywhere (e,g: 2x^ 3 â€“ 5 x), as long as the main structure we described is preserved. This Polynom can get different monoms with equal powers, The constructor will add all monoms of the same power and order all the elements from highest power to the lowest. Polynom implements function and support simple operations as: construction, value at x, add, subtract, multiply functionality, it also should support the following: 1. Riemann's Integral: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Riemann_integral 2. Finding a numerical value between two values (currently support root only f(x)=0). 3. Derivative
Author:
Meir Nizri and Avihay Bernholtz
See Also:
Serialized Form
